i mean its an ok game ig.

I have played this game many times, been up and down the ranks many times, owned hundreds of dollars worth of digital items for this game, played this game for YEARS, and used to love this game.

No, I don't ever recommend this game. The only reason people still play this game is because they either: have items worth thousands, got this game for free to try it out, or have a career based around this game. No one plays this game for "fun" anymore, and Valve knows this. They don't give a shit that people don't enjoy this game anymore, they only care about the money it rakes in. Free game with real money gambling where the only way they can sell their winnings is on valve's own item market where they take a whopping 15 FUCKING PERCENT. Valve doesn't give a single fuck about their game's community, they only give a shit about the money. That's how its been since about Operation Bloodhound. This game is awful, god awful and I recommend it to no one, even with it being free right now. 
Make a new game Valve, stop updating this pile of steaming shit.
muito legal n tenho muito tempo de jogo mais aproveito dms
